comments.html:
Could be interesting to have a feature request for this. It should not be a big deal to modify the source code to get adj RID names.
Do you see a technical reason why it has not be not already implemented ?
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: I don't see a good technical reason. If you inspect OSPF database, you have to do reverse lookup on all router IDs anyway. Probably someone forgot to change all the instances of router ID printout in the code.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
